title: Obtain the Sinner
text: You're pretty lucky to have caught Roulecca! Wanna bet with Roulecca on something?

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Yay! Is today Roulecca's lucky day too?

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: Make a bigger bet. That's still not enough... Let's bet everyone's life on it!

title: Level Start
text: Let's go have some fun!

title: Win Battles
text: Roulecca wants an even more thrilling game!

title: Lose Battles
text: Lost? Roulecca lost?! Hahaha!

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Hahahahaha!

title: Die in Battles
text: Finally... You've come to pick me up...

title: Greeting
text: It's boring to be alone... Do you want to play a game with Roulecca?

title: Conversation 1
text: Roulecca's heard a .45 bullet takes only 0.45 seconds to pass through the brain. Hmm... Who should Roulecca test it on?

title: Conversation 2
text: You know, Roulecca is a super famous assassin. Skills? Strategies? Intel? Come on. Only luckless suckers need those things. Once someone's in Roulecca's crosshairs, there's no escaping their fate!

title: Conversation 3
text: Growing up, Roulecca has never lost at any games. Roulecca doesn't need to cheat. Roulecca doesn't need to work hard either. Everyone just dotes on Roulecca—all the time. Right? Because you do too, don't you, Chief?

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Revenge is never Roulecca's purpose. Hehe, in fact, it's Roulecca's reason for living.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Bombs, enemies, Black Water, cult followers, even those deadly monsters, Roulecca is not afraid of them! I'll dig out the truth behind everything.

title: Special Conversation 3
text: Don't forget that Roulecca has placed a huge bet on you. You can't lose your life to someone else so easily.

title: Full Compliance
text: Roulecca found another four-leaf clover! Hmm, with your terrible luck, Roulecca fears you'll never spot one in your whole life. Alright... Take this one. In return, play with Roulecca for a bit more.

title: Idle
text: Piapia, piapiapiapia!

title: Annoyed
text: You seem bored. Do you want to play a game with Roulecca? Why don't we—bet on this?

title: Special Attention
text: Wow, have you come to play with Roulecca?

title: Dispatch
text: Let's go!

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Roulecca is back! Roulecca didn't wander off this time.

title: Level Up
text: Eh? Roulecca can get even stronger?

title: Join Team
text: Hmm... How much should Roulecca aim to win this time?

title: Head Pat
text: Stop ruffling my hair! I'm not a little kid! Waaa—cut it out!

title: Attire Obtained
text: Pew pew! Hehe, did I scare you, Chief? It's just a water gun! Come and play with Roulecca!

title: Greeting
text: Chief—Are you ready to gamble with Roulecca today? Whoever loses has to buy three melon popsicles!

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Roulecca loves to play on Eirene's big ship. The people there won't get angry even if I win a lot of things from them, and they always rush over to take pictures with me. They keep saying "the god of gambling is alive" and what not... I really don't understand them.

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: Lucky—I won so many cakes today! I'm so happy! However, many others also gave Roulecca dessert before, but... who were they? Hmm... darn, Roulecca can't remember...

title: Idle
text: Mmmm—what lovely weather! Chief, why don't you come and play something with me? Surfing, beachball—you name it! Roulecca is down with anything!

title: Annoyed
text: Haha... Chief, so itchy! Ahhh—Roulecca can't lose!

title: Level Up
text: Roulecca is going to win more ice cream!

title: Special Attention
text: Chief... why do you keep staring at me? Is it because you like my shark doll, too? Hmph! This is Roulecca's hard-won prize! I won't lend it to you!

title: Attire Obtained
text: Roulecca ate a strange cake this morning and turned into this. Um, Summer put it there on the table, I guess. It looked so delicious! I couldn't help myself... Hehe...

title: Greeting
text: Hide-and-seek? No, thank you. Don't assume I want to play such childish games just because Roulecca has become smaller, okay? Or, I have a better idea... How about I hide in your embrace?

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Aw... No snacks before bed? One bite, just one bite, okay? Roulecca is a lucky girl so I won't get tooth decay! I assure you!

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: Hmmm... Roulecca is tired. Chief, can you get Roulecca some teddy bears? I want to hug them as I fall asleep, like when I was little...

title: Idle
text: If I had been as strong back then as I am now, I would have been able to defeat them all even with this gun.

title: Annoyed
text: Do not treat Roulecca like a kid! Roulecca may be smaller now, but I am as clever as ever! Beating you will be easy as pie. Take that! Pew pew pew pew pew!

title: Level Up
text: I feel like I've grown taller again!

title: Special Attention
text: Hehe, doesn't this outfit look good on me, Chief? As one of my family, you should compliment me, too!
